actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the acquisition and maintenance of the Goddard Rocket Launching Site in accordance with the Act of August 25, 1916, as amended, and supplemented.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to provide for the acquisition and maintenance of the Goddard Rocket Launching Site in Auburn, Massachusetts. Authorizes necessary appropriations to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the acquisition and maintenance of the Goddard Rocket Launching Site in accordance with the Act of August 25, 1916, as amended, and supplemented.
